title: feat: hidden model support, remove Claude fallbacks, add claude-legacy
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: Secret Menu Unlocked
gist.blurb: We've added support for hidden modelsâ€”special versions available via API for the connoisseurs, while keeping the main menu clean and cozy.
gist.summary: Introduced a 'hidden' property to the model registry for API-only access and added legacy Claude and Gemini versions, while streamlining Claude routing configurations.
gist.impact: Developers can now access legacy models via specific API keys without cluttering the public dashboard, and Claude interactions are now more direct.
gist.visual_concept: The bee discovering a secret hidden item. Represents the 'hidden' models that are there if you know where to look. A bee pulling back a leaf to find a glowing scroll.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the chubby 8-bit bee mascot pulling back a large green leaf to reveal a glowing, secret golden scroll. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic. Like finding a secret in Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.
